DOC.brief_summary: PROJECT JUSTIFICATION : Cervical cancer serious public health problem Brazil , cause significant morbidity mortality among Brazilian woman . In spite government effort improve coverage rate Pap test , disease-related incidence mortality rate remain high diagnosis still late.Considering chronic human papillomavirus ( HPV ) relate genital infection lead cervical cancer development , cervical cancer target primary prevention vaccination . PROJECT OBJECTIVES : This project aim evaluate de follow vaccination indicator : 1 ) Program acceptance rate ; 2 ) Vaccine coverage rate ; 3 ) Three-dose completion rate ; 4 ) Rescue vaccination demand ; 5 ) Adverse event rate ; TARGET POPULATION : Schoolgirls attend 6th 7th grade elementary school ( mean age = 11.9 yo ) . VACCINATION PROGRAM : The program adopt quadrivalent vaccine consider superior bivalent vaccine prevent HPV-induced lesion . In addition prevent development pre-cancer lesion cervical cancer , quadrivalent vaccine also prove effective preventing condyloma , vaginal vulvar cancer . The girl receive vaccine dos school ( school-based program ) also Barretos Cancer Hospital . RESULTS : Program acceptance rate = 91.8 % ( 95 % CI : 87.0 % -96.8 % ) ; Vaccine coverage 1st , 2nd 3rd dos = 87.5 % ( 95 % CI : 82.9 % -92.2 % ) , 86.3 % ( 95 % CI : 81.8 % -91.1 % ) 85.0 % ( 95 % CI : 80.5 % -89.7 % ) . Three dose completion rate = 97.2 % ( 95 % CI : 92.0 % -100.0 % ) . Reasons drop vaccination program include : move town ( 17 ) , lose follow ( 16 ) , guardian ' decision without reasonable justification ( 3 ) , girl refuse continue program ( 1 ) pregnancy ( 2 ) . Two girl interrupt vaccination adverse event report parent . Rescue vaccination demand = 279 girl first dose ( 20.3 % ; 95 % CI : 17.9 % -22.8 % ) , 357 second dose ( 26.3 % ; 95 % CI=23.6 % -29.1 % ) 291 third dose ( 21.7 % ; 95 % CI=19.3 % -24.4 % ) . Thirty adverse event record observe 4,074 dos , provide adverse event rate 0.7 % ( 95 % CI : 0.5 % -1.1 % ) . There severe adverse event .
DOC.brief_title: Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Vaccination Barretos ( Pio XII Foundation - Barretos Cancer Hospital )
DOC.criteria: schoolgirl , attend 6th 7th grade elementary school . Pregnant breastfeeding adolescent girl attend class .
